subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Kris Draper’s short-handed goal with 6 minutes 29 seconds left broke a tie to lift the host Detroit Red Wings to a 5-3 victory against the St. Louis Blues Friday night.
snippet: Kris Draper’s short-handed goal with 6 minutes 29 seconds left broke a tie to lift the host Detroit Red Wings to a 5-3 victory against the St. Louis Blues Friday night.
